name: Virtual Breach
description:
Dodge viruses to reach and clean the heart of 2020's computer systems.

Virtual Breach is a One Button Game in which you play as a little green triangle that must avoid viruses represented as neon lines.

Dodge them to pass the three first levels and unlock the endless mode.

Survive as long as you can to beat your high score...

... and learn how to play with each different level shape! This project is my very first video game, I am a Game Design student at ISART DIGITAL Paris.
It was made within one month on Unity and using a visual scripting tool called Bolt.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to leave a comment down below :)
